sentences.en: An enrichment technique for ammonia oxidizing bacteria was introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 建立了一种氨氧化细菌的富集培养方法.

sentences.en: Books are an enrichment of life.
Enrichment and sedimentation are the principal contributor to the aging process of lakes.
sentences.cn: 富饶和沉淀是导致湖泊老化过程的主要原因.

sentences.en: Environmental enrichment does improve mental function in laboratory animals.
sentences.cn: 环境强化的确可以提高实验室动物的大脑认知能力.

sentences.en: Her chief idea of it was, the enrichment of the world by love.
sentences.cn: 她对它的主要看法是, 爱能使世界丰富多彩.

sentences.en: In many porphyry copper deposits, additional enrichment of the metal has been caused by surficial weathering.
sentences.cn: 在许多斑岩铜矿矿床中, 地表风化使得金属铜进一步富集.

sentences.en: Job enrichment should be distinguished from job enlargement.
sentences.cn: 工作丰富化和工作扩大化应加以区分.

sentences.en: Let them live together for our enrichment.
sentences.cn: 为了丰富我们的生活内容,让它们一起生存繁衍吧.

sentences.en: Most of the smaller hornblendite bodies contain about 5 - 10 percent magnetite, with only local sporadic enrichment.
sentences.cn: 在小的角闪岩体中,磁铁矿可占510%, 仅有局部的散染状富集.

sentences.en: Please as far as possible enriches oneself, enrichment life.
sentences.cn: 请尽量充实自己, 充实生活.

sentences.en: The automatic enrichment valve is composed of PTC, wax and valve needle.
sentences.cn: 自动加浓阀主要由PTC 、 石蜡体和针阀组成.

sentences.en: The concept of regional uranium enrichment has been discussed by Davidson, Saum and Link.
sentences.cn: 戴维森 、 索姆和林克等论述了区域性铀富集的条件.

sentences.en: The cranking enrichment system provides extra fuel when a cold engine is being cranked.
sentences.cn: 起动加浓系统在冷发动机起动时供应额外的燃油.

sentences.en: The result shows zinc enrichment phase makes alloy dissolve accelerative and uniformly.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,富锌相的存在使得合金溶解加速,溶解较为均匀.

sentences.en: The sound of the artillery is always an enrichment to his work.
sentences.cn: 炮声不停地在给他的工作助兴.

phrases.tran_cn: 富集培养；加富培养；增殖培养
工作丰富化；改善工作质量

trans.tran_en: Enrichment is the act of enriching someone or something or the state of being enriched
